rules.description: Emacs: Command + Tab -> Command + Tab (making sure this key combo doesn't change)
Emacs: Command -> Option
Emacs: Option -> Command
Emacs: Fn  -> Control
Emacs: Control -> Fn
⌘ + ← | Move cursor to line begin
fn + a | Move cursor to line begin
fn + e | Move cursor to line end
command + b | Move cursor one word behind
command + f | Move cursor one word ahead
⌥ + ⌫ | Delete one word
⌥ + fn + ⌫ | Delete one word ahead [laptop w/out ⌦ key]
⌥ + ⌦ | Delete one word ahead [keyboard w/ ⌦ key]
⌘ + ⌫ | Delete to line begin
⌘ + fn + ⌫ | Delete to line end [laptop w/out ⌦ key]
fn + k | Delete to line end [keyboard w/ ⌦ key]
fn + y | Paste (emacs yank)
fn + c | kill in terminal
fn + d | send killsgnl in terminal
fn + b | Move back one character
fn + f | Move forward one character
Ergoemacs mode [space as trigger key]
Ergoemacs mode [tab as trigger key]
Emacs key bindings [C-x key strokes] (rev 2)
Emacs key bindings [control+keys] (rev 10)
Emacs key bindings [option+keys] (rev 5)
Bash style Emacs key bindings (rev 2)
For Visual Studio Code: Emacs key bindings [control+keys] (rev 10)
For Visual Studio Code: Emacs key bindings [option+keys] (rev 5)
For Visual Studio Code: Bash style Emacs key bindings (rev 2)
